FuncDef:
The pppoe-server motm item delimiter command configures the delimiter between MOTM items.
The undo pppoe-server motm item delimiter command restores the default setting.
By default, the delimiter between MOTM items is a comma (,).

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the delimiter between MOTM items.
The value can be any 1-byte character. The default value is a comma (,).

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The PPPoE protocol only specifies the MOTM option value in PPPoE packets to be a character string and does not specify the option content. Different vendors can have their own MOTM option definitions. To allow the to communicate with a terminal that defines a specific delimiter, run the pppoe-server motm item delimiter command to configure the same delimiter.
Configuration Impact
If the delimiter between MOTM items in PPPoE packets is incorrectly configured, the terminal may fail to identify the MOTM option.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
